item.description:
Join me this coming Friday night,

July 6, for the first Sacred Tantric

Fire Meditation Circle!

 

We'll gather at 7:30 pm for tea and light dessert (fruit, nuts, smoothies...)

 

As the sun sets (approx 8:30 pm), we'll build a fire in either the outdoor fire pit or the outdoor fireplace and gather for the first of many STF Meditation Circles.

 

I will guide us in Sacred Ritual including building the fire, connecting with the fire through song, movement, drums/music, as well as, silence. I will include various Tantric practices to weave through the evening.  Please bring something light to share for the pot luck (7:30-8:30 pm), an instrument if you'd like, a backjack or cushion to sit on outside, and if you have a log to put on the fire, please bring one.  I also suggest you bring a water bottle.

 

The element of FIRE is about YOUR PASSION, YOUR LOVE OF LIFE, YOUR JOY, YOUR BLISS....COME EXPERIENCE THE FIRE IN A NEW WAY....AND LEAVE TRANSFORMED. Miracles happen in every moment -- the FIRE is the Mystery.

 

I am so looking forward to connecting and playing with you!

 

Playfully and lovingly,

Pushana
item.how_to_find_us: Please park IN the driveway if you can, thanks. And then on the street is fine.
item.name: Sacred Tantric Fire Meditation Circle
